item.title: Navigating Uncertainty: Effectuation Principles as the Entrepreneur's Compass
item.description: Successful companies like Sony, which transitioned from repairing war-damaged radios to producing an electric rice cooker, have incredible origin stories. Let’s explore how entrepreneurs make decisions when faced with uncertainty, drawing from Professor Sara Sarasvathy’s theory of Effectuation .
